// Pivot 0, 0
int Flipper3[14] = {
	1, 16,
	46, 23,
	62, 22,
	71, 13,
	64, 4,
	36, 7,
	2, 13
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float Flipper3[14] = {
	0.014085f, 0.551724f,
	0.647887f, 0.793103f,
	0.873239f, 0.758621f,
	1.000000f, 0.448276f,
	0.901408f, 0.137931f,
	0.507042f, 0.241379f,
	0.028169f, 0.448276f
};
